welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Carluke, a picturesque town known for its breathtaking countryside and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Gates 1-6
terminals.description: This terminal is used for boarding and disembarking flights to and from the UK and Ireland.

terminals.name: Gates 7-11
terminals.description: This terminal is used for boarding and disembarking flights to and from Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East.

terminals.name: Gates 12-14
terminals.description: This terminal is used for boarding and disembarking flights to and from North America and the rest of the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the 'EDI Airport WiFi' network and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport is used for overflow and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
